data.title: One Life To Live Crossover Archive
data.meta_description: One Life To Live crossover fanfiction archive with over 109 stories. Come in to read stories and fanfics that span multiple fandoms in the One Life To Live universe.
data.text:
One Life To Live Crossovers

Under The Surface » by Lynnlee22 What if Gina Tognoni found her way back to Young and The Restless as someone else?

Young and the Restless & One Life To Live, T, English, Drama, chapters: 11, words: 13k+, updated: 5/26 published: 3/10

5 Fresh Start » by Lynnlee22 What would happen if Kelly Cramer met Ronan Malloy in Genoa City?

Young and the Restless & One Life To Live, T, English, Romance, chapters: 9, words: 15k+, favs: 2, follows: 2, updated: 12/4/2016 published: 12/29/2013

Night To Remember » by Lynnlee22 Some things you just can't run away from. Featuring: Dinah and Hart (Guiding Light) Kelly and Joey (One Life to Live)

Guiding Light & One Life To Live, T, English, Mystery & Angst, chapters: 5, words: 10k+, favs: 1, follows: 1, updated: 11/17/2016 published: 12/29/2013

Just Another Game by Yoshizilla-Rhedosaurus Pong gets boring sometimes. And both Victoria Lord and Clint Buchanan learn it from talking to each other.

Pong & One Life To Live, K+, English, Drama, words: 274, 7/20/2016

6 Last Name » by MissDevon Take one NCIS Agent with a taste for red heads on a stake out add one pissed off red head looking for away to forget her troubles and mix with burbon and Vegas and what do you get? Something that just might not stay in Vegas.

One Life To Live & NCIS, T, English, Romance & Humor, chapters: 3, words: 9k+, favs: 4, follows: 6, updated: 1/17/2016 published: 12/7/2009, Natalie B., Leroy Jethro Gibbs

56 Dance with the Devil » by MSquared79 Total rewrite of the Morgan/Lord baby swap story. When tabloid publisher Todd Manning is shot in his hotel room in Port Charles, New York, it leads to revelations that go deep into the heart of his family, uniting them with new allies in a new town. TnB, Lord family heavy.

General Hospital & One Life To Live, T, English, Family & Mystery, chapters: 76, words: 150k+, favs: 8, follows: 7, updated: 12/22/2015 published: 1/12/2014, [Blair C., Todd M.]

8 Coming Home Again » by jacqs30 After John and Natalie break up the first time, Natalie decides to leave Llanview for a fresh start. It's now Christmas 2009 and she's finally ready to come home to visit the family she left behind. Natalie/John and Derek/Penelope potential romances.

One Life To Live & Criminal Minds, T, English, Mystery & Friendship, chapters: 11, words: 11k+, favs: 8, follows: 10, updated: 12/18/2015 published: 5/15/2011, Natalie B., D. Morgan

2 Coming Home » by MrsDash The continuance of "A New Life," Todd returns to Llanview along with his new wife and former therapist. Thinking he has left the city of Port Charles behind, Todd is surprised to find an exodus of some of that towns citizens in Llanview as well. Although Todd and his wife have left Port Charles, the drama has certainly followed. Told from the point of view of the new Mrs. Manning.

General Hospital & One Life To Live, T, English, Drama & Romance, chapters: 8, words: 13k+, favs: 2, follows: 1, updated: 10/5/2015 published: 4/9/2015, AJ Quartermaine, Carly C., Todd M., Blair C.

7 A New Life » by MrsDash Told through the point of view of Todds therapist. Todd Manning has moved to Port Charles and is beginning his new life. Meeting his new therapist, she changes his life. Still fighting old demons and finding trouble at every turn.

General Hospital & One Life To Live, K+, English, Drama & Romance, chapters: 84, words: 191k+, favs: 2, follows: 4, updated: 2/1/2015 published: 1/27/2014, Todd M.

1 A Friend in Need by samanthajax On a night when Sam McCall needs someone just to care, Rex Balsom is there. A pre-canon one shot.

General Hospital & One Life To Live, T, English, Friendship & Hurt/Comfort, words: 1k+, 7/30/2014, Sam M., Rex B.

11 Abyss, No More by niklovr Kevin and Todd fake Evangeline's death, but what happens when she awakens from the coma to find that her world has changed? Meanwhile John is hot on Todd's trail, but he can't stop thinking about Evangeline. If all obstacles are removed, can they finally get it right this time?

General Hospital & One Life To Live, T, English, Drama & Romance, words: 3k+, favs: 3, follows: 4, 6/30/2014, Lucky, Todd M., John MB, Evangeline W.

9 Runaway Bride » by Lori2279 My version of Natalie and Brody's wedding blow-up. Set in my From Oz to Kansas universe. I threw in an old friend from Loving for good measure.

General Hospital & One Life To Live, K+, English, Drama & Angst, chapters: 7, words: 14k+, favs: 3, follows: 6, updated: 5/23/2014 published: 11/20/2011, Rebecca S., Natalie B.

17 Testing Fate » by ToniLOVESjolie This is my take on the tv show Supernatural with my favorite characters from OLTL. When Two brothers fighting a constant battle between good and evil end up joining a group of people who are also looking for justice and revenge, will they be able to overcome their own personal demons or will it prove to be too much for them to handle.

One Life To Live & Supernatural, K, English, Supernatural & Drama, chapters: 9, words: 33k+, favs: 3, follows: 3, updated: 5/19/2014 published: 4/30/2014, John MB, Natalie B.

Retrograde - Chapter 4 by deannafstr Finally updated this story! I didn't want to say too much about the direction when I first began this story, but, in this chapter the story begins. I didn't realize I was going to write so much build up. So, in this chapter - One Life to Live's Nora Buchanan and Will Rappaport reveal they shared feelings for each other. Will Nora have an affair with Will, Sam Rappaport's son?

General Hospital & One Life To Live, K+, English, Drama, words: 7k+, 4/11/2014, Will R.

3 In His Corner » by MSquared79 When Todd is accused of a crime no one thinks him capable of anymore, an unlikely group of people come together to defend him. NOTE: Published wrong chapter, first time around. Correct first chapter up.

General Hospital & One Life To Live, T, English, Drama & Crime, chapters: 10, words: 16k+, favs: 4, follows: 6, updated: 3/27/2014 published: 10/7/2013, Carly C., Blair C.

31 Human Touch » by niklovr With Springsteen's "Human Touch" as inspiration, this fic explores how "damaged" John McBain & "gun-shy" Evangeline Williamson reconcile their issues 2gether. Van's cousin, Keesha Ward is torn btw Jason Morgan & Ryan Lavery. Meanwhile, Kevin Buchanan recovers from his divorce from Kelly as he falls for Nikolas Cassadine's former love. Everyone's connected. Updating in 2014.

One Life To Live & General Hospital, T, English, Drama & Romance, chapters: 18, words: 34k+, favs: 6, follows: 7, updated: 3/14/2014 published: 8/22/2004, Jason M., John MB, Evangeline W., Kevin B.

4 Damaged » by Melissa Brooks Marty moves to Port Charles to counsel Michael.

General Hospital & One Life To Live, T, English, Drama, chapters: 10, words: 7k+, favs: 2, follows: 3, updated: 2/5/2014 published: 2/4/2012, Carly C., Michael C. III, AJ Quartermaine, Marty S.

3 Two-Sided Fairy Tales » by MSquared79 The timeless tale of Beauty and the Beast, each with their own twists. In a land with newly reborn magic, one couple discovers the story of true love is still told. In a small town, another couple tells their granddaughter of how true love exists in the real world.

One Life To Live & Once Upon a Time, T, English, Romance, chapters: 2, words: 1k+, favs: 3, 1/19/2014, [Blair C., Todd M.] [Belle/Lacey, Rumpelstiltskin/Mr. Gold]

Retrograde - Chapter 3 by deannafstr Continuation...

General Hospital & One Life To Live, K+, English, words: 3k+, 1/6/2014

Retrograde - Chapter 2 by deannafstr Continuation from Retrograde - Chapter 1.

General Hospital & One Life To Live, K+, English, Drama, words: 4k+, 12/20/2013

RETROGRADE by deannafstr Three months after Nora Buchanan stepped down as District Attorney, and Lindsay Rappaport mysteriously escaped prison with the suspected help from her son, Will Rappaport; she decides to go against her own husband, Commissioner Bo Buchanan and the FBI in order to prove Lindsay and Will's innocence.

General Hospital & One Life To Live, T, English, Drama, words: 1k+, 12/18/2013

1 When Your Heart Finds Christmas by batie-state-of-mind Adriana Cramer is marooned in Port Charles on Christmas Eve where she meets the one man she probably thought she'd never be attracted to - Dante Falconeri. A one shot.

General Hospital & One Life To Live, K+, English, Romance, words: 2k+, 12/1/2013, Dante F., Adriana C.

Dangerous Territory and Unsettling Revelations by Melissa Brooks This story is AU. Bo finds out that LIndsey has been keeping a terrible secret from him on their wedding day.

General Hospital & One Life To Live, T, English, Drama, words: 470, 11/24/2013, Matt H., Kristina D., Anna D., Bo B.

2 Port Charles Return by MSquared79 Todd has business back in Port Charles. And he doesn't come alone. He brings his wife.

General Hospital & One Life To Live, K+, English, Romance, words: 817, favs: 4, follows: 1, 10/21/2013, [Carly C., AJ Quartermaine] [Todd M., Blair C.]

5 Runaway Crash by Melissa Brooks Zach and Marty crash into one another when they are running away from the mess that their lives had become.

All My Children & One Life To Live, T, English, Drama, words: 703, favs: 1, 10/17/2013, [Zach S., Marty S.]

70 | Page 1 .. Last Next »
